document.full_text: u.s. gasoline demand fell in april for the time in three months as high pump prices and expensive grocery bills took their toll on drivers, the american petroleum institute said on friday.
document.title: high pump prices cut into april gasoline demand: api
lines_and_colors: u.s. gasoline demand fell in april for the time in three months as high pump prices and expensive grocery bills took their toll on drivers, the american petroleum institute said on friday.
